column14: As a manager, I should able to add new staff so that I can increase the number of staff when new staff join the company.
column19: Design a UI with textfields which include Name,IC,Contact No,Address,Email to let the user key in the new staff details,radio button also provided for gender and position selection.Provide three buttons which are "Confirm" , "Reset" and "Back" button for user to select.
column21: Make the system able to add the new staff details into the database.
column23: Prompt successful message if the new staff detail successful added into the database

column14: As a user of the system, I should have a username and password so that I can log in into the system to use the functions of the system.
column19: Design a UI with textfield which include Username and password to let the user key in username and password.Provide "Login", "Reset" and "Forget Password" buttons for user to select.
column21: Make the system able to verify the username and password through database
column23: Prompt error message when username or password is incorrect
column25: Prompt successful message when the username and password are correct
column27: Redirect the user to the homepage of the system

column14: As a manager, I should able to view staff information in detail so that I can clearly know about my staff.

column21: Make the system able to retrieve the staff information from the database
column23: Display the staff information which include Name,Date of Birth,IC,Gender,Contact No,Address,Email,Position and Status.

column14: As a manager, I should able to add new route so that I can create more route for the customer to choose.

column29: Display successful updated message if the update successful.
